long_description: With moisture-wicking, quick drying technical fabric, the heavyweight REI Airflyte long underwear top keeps girls warm and comfortable in cold weather. The low mock neck is warm but not restrictive. Stretchy polyester/spandex fabric helps provide freedom of movement and formfitting style. Thumbholes in the cuffs help keep sleeves in place. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays.
short_description: With moisture-wicking, quick drying technical fabric, the heavyweight REI Airflyte long underwear top keeps girls warm and comfortable in cold weather. The low mock neck is warm but not restrictive.
